page.title: 12A TYPICAL SCHOOL DAY
page.content: 06.20 I wake up and get dressed. 06.30 Breakfast and then feed the hens. 07.00 I brush my teeth and then wash my face. 07.05 Read. 08.10 I go to the village shop. 08.30 The school bus arrives. 08.45 We arrive at school. 09.00 School begins. 09.05 Assembly and then set out the Nursery room. 09.25 Handwriting lesson. 09.35 Mathematics session. 10.15 French. 10.30 Morning Break,possibly on the school field. 10.45 End of break. 10.45 Topic Work. 11.45 English. 12.10 Wash hands for lunch. 12.15 Lunch in school dining room.
